author: Rogue10
title: Different Opinion
review:
A lot of folks don't seem to care for this set, but I rather like it--I just got 4 (rather late, but still)

It is what it is--a case of coca cola.  Good for using as a decorative peice--I bought them to be shipped around by my train setup.  There's not really any other way to make your own version of this set, since the smoked glass cones are pretty rare--and the clear ones as well.  So for a case of soda--this does well.
